/**@fn        CanReceiveItemIntoCargo

bool CanReceiveItemIntoCargo(EntityAI item)

**/

Author: docbuddy
Content: Or is there any example for adding synced sound to a gesture?

Author: itsatreee
Content: Need a netsync if you want to have sounds play across clients

Author: itsatreee
Content:
The concept is fairly simple. 

Register the netsynchvariable.

A bool controls when the sound is played.

You flip the bool on the server, SetSynchDirty

Then on the client side OnVariablesSynchronized you check the bool and trigger the sound via a condition.
